credit.name: Devoid
credit.desc: Nice to meet you, my name is Devoid. I'm a rather reserved person outside of digital space, but only if you find a way to communicate with me will I be able to speak openly with you. I tested 'Secret of Rerun', looking for information about scrapped, old, unrealesed content from 'Vs Sonic.Exe: RERUN'
